name: RetroBeepsAlarm
0:
”Alexa, wake me up at 7:00 AM to retro beeps alarm tone”
”Alexa, set an alarm at 7:00 AM to retro beeps alarm tone”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: retro beeps alarm
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sick of the all the fancy tones, jingles, chimes and otherwise pleasant and cheerful "alarms" from the mobile age? Those are songs- not alarms! What you need are those good old-fashioned electronic BUZZERS and BEEPS that woke a nation full of yuppies, preppies, punks, dorks, nerds, bikers, liars, con-artists, bible-thumpers, computer geeks, board game freaks, radicals, reactionaries, bankers, skankers, and news anchors!

Retro Beeps Alarm features 2 free retro beep alarms: "Casio Dreams," and "Brutal Buzz" plus a special get-out-of-bed snooze buzzer: "No Snooze for Youze."

Get Retro Beeps Gold to unlock seven MORE Retro Beep alarms including: "Me and My Microwave," "Buzz-Kill," "Hell'z Buzz," "Beyond Beeps," "Hammer of the Grogs," "Reign of Reagan," and "Birth of the Beepers"

No alarm clocks were harmed during the making of this alarm. Some got smacked.

FEEDBACK AND SUPPORT: If you enjoyed Retro Beeps Alarm, please leave us a review telling us what you love, and what alarms you want to hear next!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
